crystals.title: Tangible Energy
crystals.hint: Crystal energy is mostly an ethereal, intagible force. However, when concentrated, it may have a physical manifestation.
crystals.reveal: Sure enough, you have found places where crystal energy has coalesced and formed regular, glassy formations, ones that radiate the effects of their element.
crystals.desc: Underground crystals of energy, radiating the effect of their element

casting.title: Fabrication
casting.hint: Surely the wooden crafting table is not sufficient to do all your crafting.
casting.reveal: As expected, to perform feats more complex than making a wooden box to store your items, you needed to create a special more magically-sound table.
casting.desc: To create anything remotely magical, you needed a dedicated, magically-capable table on which to do it

dyetree.title: Technicolor Trees
dyetree.hint: These trees seem to come in all sorts of colors; you wonder if there is something special about them.
dyetree.reveal: Well, they seem to drop berries and dyes of their color, so that has to count for something...
dyetree.desc: Trees, likely magical, of every color, and which drop not only saplings but dyes and berries

multiblock.title: More Complex Crafting
multiblock.hint: The more complex ideas you have could not possibly be pulled off with only nine constituent items...
multiblock.reveal: Sure enough, the 5x5 afforded by the item stands is what you need.
multiblock.desc: Using item stands has allowed you to expand the complexity of your crafting recipes

runeuse.title: Weak Magical Foci
runeuse.hint: You may not be able to harness the power of the pylons yet, but these may make a milder alternative, allowing you to enhance your crafting capabilities.
runeuse.reveal: That they do, allowing you to make items more infused with energy than simple stone.
runeuse.desc: The beginnings of harnessing crystal energy, allowing you to enhance your crafting

pylon.title: Energy Beacons
pylon.hint: Glowing and radiant, what are these?
pylon.reveal: Some sort of an energy beacon...probably a good idea to remember that.
pylon.desc: A source of crystal energy, almost dangerously powerful and of incalculable value

link.title: Top-tier Crafting
link.hint: Finally you can harness the pylons, but how to put it to use?
link.reveal: Channeling all that energy directly into the table has allowed you to construct devices from your wildest imagination.
link.desc: Crafting with lumen energy allows for the creation of powerful constructs

charge.title: Energy Internalization
charge.hint: If the pylons and trees can store energy, maybe you can too...
charge.reveal: Turns out you can, though the acquisition process is more dangerous than is enjoyable.
charge.desc: Collecting energy in oneself to...do something

ability.title: Personal Enhancement
ability.hint: Machines you can upgrade. Tools you can enchant. Yourself?
ability.reveal: A new set of rituals has given you abilities of great utility.
ability.desc: Various powers and abilities offer huge potential

rainbowleaf.title: Magical Trees
rainbowleaf.hint: Trees in various colors were one thing. But this?
rainbowleaf.reveal: The raw magic energy in this tree is palpable, not to mention behind the impressive visual display.
rainbowleaf.desc: A giant tree of iridescent hue. It surely has magic power that you can only imagine

makechroma.title: Magic Liquid
makechroma.hint: A collector, but of what, and from what?
makechroma.reveal: Experience can be converted to a mysterious magic fluid. Surely that will have uses.
makechroma.desc: A distilled essence of experience, or magic, with as-yet unknown purpose

shardcharge.title: Enriching Solvent
shardcharge.hint: The liquid is pulsing and throbbing with raw magical energy. You wonder what its effects are...
shardcharge.reveal: Dissolving berries in the chroma allows it to greatly boost the magic energy found in the crystal shards.
shardcharge.desc: Enhancing the power of a crystal shard with elemental energy distilled from the trees

chroma.title: Liquid Effects
chroma.hint: Liquid chroma has already proven itself a solvent for items tossed in. What else might happen?
chroma.reveal: Stepping in it yourself seemed to do little - though you do feel a bit rejuvenated - but its power to enrich materials is not insignificant.
chroma.desc: This liquid has enriching power, and you have only scratched the surface

alloy.title: Magic Alloying
alloy.hint: What about mundane materials, perhaps with other materials mixed in?
alloy.reveal: The chroma dissolves those materials, infusing the mundane materials with a great deal of energy.
alloy.desc: The creation of magical materials with the enriching power of liquid chroma

stones.title: Unity of the Elements
stones.hint: What effect does combining all the different elements have?
stones.reveal: This gemstone throbs will all the colors of energy. That will surely prove useful.
stones.desc: A complete collection of the crystal elements into a gem

shock.title: Damaging Discharge
shock.reveal: If your idea of "friendly" is a discharge to the face...
shock.desc: Proximity to a crystal pylon, at least for now, is clearly undesirable

nether.title: The Evil Realm
nether.hint: You need some other way below that unyielding rock...
nether.reveal: So those stories of obsidian portals leading to a fiery nightmare are true...
nether.desc: A hostile, unpleasant world of lava, red rock, and nightmarish creatures

end.title: The Alien Realm
end.hint: Surely nothing could be more alien than that land of lava, glowing stalactites, and flying jellyfish...
end.desc: A...strange world suspended in the void, ruled by an aggressive dragon

twilight.title: The Forested Realm
twilight.hint: Legends tell of a different plane, covered in thick forests, with giant towers and buried mazes.
twilight.reveal: Not only does this realm exist, but it teems with unique creatures and is plentiful with treasure.
twilight.desc: A mystical forest dotted with massive structures and strange creatures

bedrock.title: World Floor
bedrock.hint: Is it possible to dig too deep?
bedrock.reveal: Maybe, but that layer of rock below seems impenetrable.
bedrock.desc: An unyielding barrier to those who attempt to dig downwards

cavern.title: Buried Hollows
cavern.reveal: Buried deep in the rock, these crystal-rich cavities hold further intrigue.
cavern.desc: A buried room, populated with crystals and some random loot

burrow.title: Secret Burrows
burrow.hint: Patches of light dot the night landscape; some are explainable as lava or fire, but not all...
burrow.reveal: Upon closer inspection, you found hidden burrows stocked with goods, but for who?
burrow.desc: A small burrow, with a handful of starter items

ocean.title: Ocean Temples
ocean.hint: Stories abound of strange structures left in the deepest parts of the ocean.
ocean.reveal: True stories, it seems. If only they warned of the danger...
ocean.desc: A large submerged structure which is more complex than it first appears

desertstruct.title: Sandy Burrows
desertstruct.hint: Aside from the rare (and explosive) pyramids, do deserts hold other secrets?
desertstruct.reveal: They do indeed, and their riches eclipse most others.
desertstruct.desc: A subsurface hollow, filled with loot but also danger

snowstruct.title: Snowy Outposts
snowstruct.hint: Snow and ice as far as the eye can see, and yet there remain things to find.
snowstruct.reveal: Including, it seems, long-abandoned outposts holding...something.
snowstruct.desc: A rich discovery in a desolate arctic wasteland

die.title: Painful Loss
die.hint: You lose your items when you die; what happens to your knowledge?
die.desc: Like your items, your knowledge and energy is also lost upon your demise

allcolors.title: Elemental Awareness
allcolors.hint: Red, Green, Blue, Orange, how many are there?
allcolors.reveal: You have identified sixteen, each with a unique color and symbolic icon.
allcolors.desc: Sixteen colors, sixteen forms of energy, each tuned to a specific property

repeater.title: Broadcasting
repeater.hint: You need a better way to transfer lumen energy from the pylons to your base.
repeater.reveal: These refractors of a sort seem to be able to reconcentrate and repeat the signal.
repeater.desc: A more refined and effective form of lumen transmission

rainbowforest.title: Magical Forests
rainbowforest.hint: You have heard rumors of forests populated with those brightly colored trees as far as the eye can see...
rainbowforest.reveal: Not only do such forests exist, but they also teem with animals and plants, and the magic keeps hostile forces at bay.
rainbowforest.desc: A magic forest, full of multicolored trees and with significant power to keep evil away

glowcliffs.title: Glowing Terraces
glowcliffs.hint: Are all the magical areas in this world forests? Might there be rare exceptions?
glowcliffs.reveal: Every level of this strange new place seems to contain novel phenomena, resources, or flora.
glowcliffs.desc: Large terraced cliffs, with a distinctly unusual ambience

dimension.title: Other Worlds
dimension.hint: You have been to several other worlds, each stranger than the last...could there be more?
dimension.reveal: There are indeed, but this one...is different.
dimension.desc: A new world...strange, yet peaceful and serene. And vibrantly hued

ctm.title: Restoration
ctm.reveal: The reward for completing and restoring the monument must be large.
ctm.desc: Completing the ruined monument, with surely significant reward

storage.title: Lumen Storage
storage.hint: Some constructs need to be moved around, making repeater-based power difficult. Is there an alternative?
storage.reveal: Fortunately, you have found out how to store energy in a crystal matrix for exactly this purpose.
storage.desc: Storing energy in a crystal for easy mobility

balllightning.title: Orbs of Energy
balllightning.hint: Pylons and some trees seem to spawn odd balls of energy.
balllightning.reveal: They do not seem particularly useful, but at least they are not obviously dangerous.
balllightning.desc: A glowing, moving clump of energy that seems to be animated on its own

powercrystal.title: Recharge
powercrystal.hint: Pylons drain too quickly for intensive use, and take too long to recharge.
powercrystal.reveal: That ring of iridescent crystals dramatically helps.
powercrystal.desc: Upgrading a pylon with a ring of eight power crystals massively improves its energy recovery

killdragon.title: Aerial Predator
killdragon.hint: The static sky is empty...save for a massive dragon.
killdragon.reveal: Killing it has revealed yet more of the world to you.
killdragon.desc: A giant, hostile dragon whose destruction gives both physical and conceptual reward

findspawner.title: Endless Mobs
findspawner.hint: What is that strange flaming box?
findspawner.reveal: A construct of some malevolent origin, a source for an interminable stream of creatures.
findspawner.desc: Strange metal boxes that release infinite numbers of monsters

breakspawner.title: Stopping the Torrent
breakspawner.hint: These metal cages spew forth endless creatures...how to put an end to it?
breakspawner.reveal: The only way to stop them is to destroy them...for now.
breakspawner.desc: Destroying a spawner not only stops the flood of creatures, but also lets you better understand, and maybe even harvest it

killwither.title: Eldritch Nightmare
killwither.hint: Four soul sand. Three wither skulls. What could this possibly be useful for?
killwither.reveal: An undead monstrosity, though its loot proved useful.
killwither.desc: A nightmarish creature which drops a mysterious but obviously valuable star

hive.title: Crystal Hives
hive.hint: Can bees live in the darkness of underground caves?
hive.reveal: Yes, they can, and not only that, but they take on the effect of nearby cave crystals.
hive.desc: Underground, crystalline hives full of uniquely adapted bees

killmob.title: Monster Slayer
killmob.hint: Certain creatures prove vicious, and will need to be dealt with.
killmob.reveal: Conveniently, they drop useful items when killed.
killmob.desc: Killing various creatures, especially hostile ones, drops an assortment of useful items

allcores.title: Dimensional Cores
allcores.hint: They come in various colors...what are they for?
allcores.reveal: I have all sixteen...maybe these are for that monument I need to repair...
allcores.desc: Collecting all sixteen glowing orbs, for some unified purpose

turbocharge.title: Pylon Turbocharging
turbocharge.hint: This should be possible...if somewhat violent.
turbocharge.reveal: More so than expected, but also far more valuable.
turbocharge.desc: Greatly enhancing the power of a crystal pylon

useenergy.title: Lumen Harnessing
useenergy.hint: If pylons are a source of energy, does that mean they can be used?
useenergy.reveal: Yes, and the myriad constructs powered by them offer great utility.
useenergy.desc: Relaying the signal from a crystal pylon allows for feasible use of their energy

structcomplete.title: Unusual Structures
structcomplete.hint: Large structures dot the volatile realm. What lies deep inside them?
structcomplete.reveal: A glowing core, tuned to one of the crystal colors. Interesting...
structcomplete.desc: Completing the task in the strange construction, and being consequently rewarded

netherroof.title: A second layer
netherroof.hint: The evil realm seems capped. Is the cap impenetrable?
netherroof.reveal: No, and further mysteries await for those who venture into it.
netherroof.desc: Getting above the impassable layer at the top of the Nether

netherstruct.title: Ominous Constructions
netherstruct.hint: Strange things dot and cross the Nether roof.
netherstruct.desc: Finding the secrets buried in the Nether

villagecasting.title: A...less than honorable attempt
villagecasting.hint: Are you the only one to have tried to learn these magic forces?
villagecasting.reveal: No, but the others who tried have clearly been about as smart as a piece of flint.
villagecasting.desc: The villagers have tried - and abjectly failed - to learn to manipulate crystal energy.

anystruct.title: Buried Ruins
anystruct.hint: From cobblestone squares to ancient mines, it appears some have come before you; have they left anything else?
anystruct.reveal: Yes, including their attempts to learn the same things you now attempt.
anystruct.desc: Buried structures, clearly of artificial origin

focuscrystal.title: Refractory Gems
focuscrystal.hint: You have thought of a way to increase the power of your fabrication constructs, but what to use as a refractor?
focuscrystal.reveal: Who would have thought THEY had found the key...
focuscrystal.desc: Crude 'refining' of emeralds into a useful construct

artefact.title: Mysterious Relics
artefact.hint: All around the world linger remnants of...something.
artefact.reveal: Including particularly mysterious - and dangerous - ones found in certain regions.
artefact.desc: A strange buried artifact, surely possessing secrets

tower.title: Glowing Towers
tower.hint: The pylons are not the only luminous constructs you find around the world.
tower.reveal: The purpose these obelisks serve is a entirely unknown, but they must be key to something.
tower.desc: An ancient structure, topped with a luminescent...something.

blowrepeater.title: Lumen Overload
blowrepeater.hint: These wooden lumen foci seem to work quite well...
blowrepeater.desc: Wood and chroma repeaters might have been a mistake

chargecrystal.title: Lumen Storage II
chargecrystal.hint: A storage crystal is little more than a pretty rock without a way to put the energy into it.
chargecrystal.reveal: As is usual, a simple problem has a simple - and spinny - solution.
chargecrystal.desc: Putting energy into a storage crystal

structcheat.title: Finding a shortcut
structcheat.hint: You may have the means to attempt to bypass the strange structures you find.
structcheat.reveal: With disastrous results. Whoever designed those structures is clearly more resourceful than you are.

voidmonster.title: A distortion below the world
voidmonster.hint: Exactly what that thing is, remains unknown.
voidmonster.reveal: Some sort of foreboding corruption of reality.

voidmonsterdie.title: Contact with the corruption
voidmonsterdie.reveal: That thing must now be destroyed after what it has done to you.

luma.title: Ethereal Luma
luma.reveal: The essence of the void, of space, as well as lumen energy.
luma.desc: A liquid of both energy and space

warpnode.title: Energy Vortices
warpnode.hint: Some sort of hole in space.
warpnode.reveal: Which may provide a method to travel between them.

powertree.title: Stockpiling Energy
powertree.hint: A construct which has the ability to draw lumens into itself...for what?
powertree.reveal: Apparently to act as a large buffer or storage.

tunecast.title: Casting Personalization
tunecast.hint: How to imprint yourself onto your casting structure?
tunecast.reveal: That should have been rather obvious in hindsight.
tunecast.desc: Linking your crafting to your person

bypassweak.title: Retroactive Recognition
bypassweak.hint: This particular design seems somewhat familiar, and not in a good way.
bypassweak.reveal: Prediction of upcoming mistakes enables you to avoid them altogether.

infuse.title: Resourceful Experience
infuse.hint: Can one even combine such disparate things as items, liquids, and players?
infuse.reveal: As with most things, all it took was the proper construct.

pylonlink.title: Energy Interconnection
pylonlink.hint: You can connect one pylon to a network, but that still leaves all the others...
pylonlink.reveal: Linking them together makes for a much larger energy pool and recharge rate.
pylonlink.desc: A way to make use of multiple pylons per color

relays.title: Compact Transmission
relays.hint: Not all constructs are amenable to normal energy transfer, being used indoors or in large numbers.
relays.reveal: Fortunately, they seem to be receptive to a scaled-down and more orthogonal method of conduction.

energyidea.title: Refined Transmission
energyidea.hint: Wood and chroma repeaters are of marginal quality.
energyidea.reveal: And these crystals surely hold the key to something better.

node.title: Energy Inlet
node.hint: Where does this aspect-based energy originate?
node.reveal: That remains unknown, but it leaks in via tiny holes.

potion.title: Ambient Effects
potion.hint: Can I improve my various powers, without tools?
potion.reveal: Yes, and this may only be the start.

mine.title: Resource Acquisition
mine.hint: Where can I find the raw materials to begin?
mine.reveal: Many different ores populate the world.
mine.desc: The source of many of the raw materials.

deepcave.title: Lower Layers
deepcave.hint: Cave systems seem to extend far below the surface.
deepcave.reveal: The deeper I go, the more exotic the things I find.

harvest.title: Crop Collection
harvest.hint: Some materials are mined, and others grown.
harvest.reveal: The latter includes a wide variety.

myst.title: A Scripted World
myst.hint: I can create worlds out of words.
myst.reveal: And these words describe novel features and resources.

biomestruct.title: An Abandoned Puzzle
biomestruct.hint: What might be found in the more magically-attuned biomes?
biomestruct.reveal: A structure that once completed, contains far more riches than any other so far.
biomestruct.desc: A structure in a magic forest, locked down behind tests of skill

farlands.title: Outer Regions
farlands.hint: Is this world the same forever?
farlands.reveal: No, areas distant from the entry point contain novel formations, materials, and...others.
farlands.desc: New areas in a new world

mudhint.title: Magical Residue
mudhint.hint: Can magical materials be found naturally? What happens when large amounts congregate? Does this stuff break down over time?
mudhint.reveal: The debris falling off of rainbow trees accumulates and creates a muddy substance below.
